Title: Authorizes county clerks to retain a portion of fees collected for motor vehicle related services through a department of motor vehicles' website
Summary: Authorizes county clerks to retain a portion of fees collected for motor vehicle related service fees and requires the commissioner to remit such fees to the county clerks on a quarterly basis.
LawCode: Amd ยง205, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing county clerks to retain fees collected for motor vehicle related services through a department of motor vehicles' website
